channel.title: Softlayer_container_virtual_dedicatedhost_allocationstatus on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_virtual_dedicatedhost_allocationstatus on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_DedicatedHost_AllocationStatus
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Virtual_DedicatedHost_AllocationStatus Datatype Description This data type represents the structure to hold the allocation properties of a [[SoftLayer_Virtual_DedicatedHost]]. Local cpuAllocated Number of allocated CPU cores on the specified dedicated host. Type: integer cpuAvailable Number of available CPU cores on the specified dedicated host. Type: integer cpuCount Total number of CPU cores on the dedicated host. Type: integer
